snippet.title: Battle Blues   배틀 블루스 3DO,1996,South Korea
snippet.description: This is just a fast vid I did for people who are curious of how the game is. The game controls are a bit tricky , the guy doesn't always go where you want him to go, this game would have been a bit better with a "3DO dual shock" :).
